title: Resolve Double Charge Claim
description: A customer calls claiming they were charged twice for a single online order.

tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the customer's order in the system.

tasks.description: Check the payment transaction history for that order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent sees two payment authorization attempts but confirms that only one was actually captured.

tasks.description: Explain to the customer that one charge is a temporary authorization that will drop off their statement, and that they were only truly charged once. Offer to send a copy of the payment receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent clarifies the situation and resolves the customer's concern.
